name: Iron Coals
description:
Adds 5 tiers of coal, coal chunks, coal blocks, and torches
New Tiers:
 - Iron Coal can smelt 12 items
 - Gold Coal can smelt 24 items
 - Diamond Coal can smelt 48 items
 - Emerald Coal can smelt 96 items
 - Aeon Coal can smelt unlimited items
Coal chunks smelt 1/8th of their respective coals
